subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: J. D. Drew hit a three-run homer in the first inning, doubled in the third, and drove in a run with a single in the fourth in Boston’s 7-4 win over host Philadelphia. He finished 4 for 5 with four runs batted in.
snippet: J. D. Drew hit a three-run homer in the first inning, doubled in the third, and drove in a run with a single in the fourth in Boston’s 7-4 win over host Philadelphia. He finished 4 for 5 with four runs batted in.
